typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		country_code as string,
		continent as string,
		population as integer,
		indicator as string,
		daily_count as short,
		date as date,
		rate_14_day as double,
		source as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CasesAndDeathsSource
CasesAndDeathsSource filter(continent == 'Europe' && not(isNull(country_code))
) ~> FilterEuropeOnly
FilterEuropeOnly select(mapColumn(
		country,
		country_code,
		population,
		indicator,
		daily_count,
		source,
		each(match(name == 'date'),
			'Reported' + '_date' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOnlyReqFields
SelectOnlyReqFields pivot(groupBy(country,
		country_code,
		population,
		source,
		Reported_date),
	pivotBy(indicator),
	count = sum(daily_count),
	columnNaming: '$V_$N',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotDeathsAndCasesCounts
